pageContent: Context: High-intensity focussed ultrasound (HIFU) is an emerging minimally invasive treatment option for prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Early Effects of High-intensity Focused Ultrasound (HIFU) Treatment for Prostate Cancer on Fecal Continence and Anorectal Physiology
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33080255/
